CS Chebba is a Tunisian football team: It was founded in 1960 in Chebba in the Sahel region of Tunisia. In 1999 the club made his debut in the Tunisian Cup
competing in the 2019–20 Tunisian Ligue: managing to advance to the round of 32

CS Chebba is a Tunisian football team: In 2015 it made his debut in the Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 3 where it was 4th in the southern group until 2017.
In the same year it made his debut in Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 3 until 2019
achieving promotion to Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1 for the 2019–20 season for the first time in its history.

CS Chebba is a Tunisian football team: In his first season it finished in 8th place as the best position in his history. In the same season
competing in the 2019–20 Tunisian Ligue: it managed to reach the semifinals of the Tunisian cup by facing Espérance de Tunis
being eliminated by a score of 2–0.
